members.name: enable
members.description: Enable the background mode.Once called, prevents the app from being paused while in background.

members.name: disable
members.description: Disable the background mode.Once the background mode has been disabled, the app will be paused when in background.

members.name: isEnabled
members.description: Checks if background mode is enabled or not.

members.name: isActive
members.description: Can be used to get the information if the background mode is active.

members.name: setDefaults
members.description: Override the default title, ticker and text.Available only for Android platform.

params.name: options
params.description: List of option to configure. See table below

members.name: configure
members.description: Modify the displayed information.Available only for Android platform.

params.name: options
params.description: Any options you want to update. See table below.

members.name: on
members.description: Listen for events that the plugin fires. Available events are `enable`, `disable`, `activate`, `deactivate` and `failure`.

members.name: moveToBackground
members.description: Android allows to programmatically move from foreground to background.

members.name: moveToForeground
members.description: Android allows to programmatically move from background to foreground.

members.name: overrideBackButton
members.description: Override the back button on Android to go to background instead of closing the app.

members.name: excludeFromTaskList
members.description: Exclude the app from the recent task list works on Android 5.0+.

members.name: isScreenOff
members.description: The method works async instead of isActive() or isEnabled().

members.name: unlock
members.description: Turn screen on and show app even locked
